entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 7:32 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: SSW 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow except periods of rain along parts of the coast overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
